description: This bright, Willow Edge END unit townhome is immaculately maintained & offers the best of family living. The open concept main floor boasts 9-foot ceilings, POWDER ROOM, fresh paint, newer laminate flooring, & gas fireplace. The kitchen features upgraded stainless appliances, newer counters, refreshed cabinets, spacious eating area & an island…perfect for entertaining! 3 bedrooms up, newer carpets, & 2 baths with updated sinks & counters. Enjoy a level walkout from the kitchen to the backyard patio, kids’ park, greenspace & walking path. Parking for 3 vehicles includes a double tandem garage (with storage) & a long driveway. Quiet location just minutes to Costco & Willowbrook’s many shops & restaurants! 2 pets allowed.
